term.title: adsorption isobar

item.text: The function relating the amount, mass, or volume, or corresponding excess of substance adsorbed by a given amount of solid, to the temperature at constant pressure.

sources.item: PAC, 1972, 31, 577. 'Manual of Symbols and Terminology for Physicochemical Quantities and Units, Appendix II: Definitions, Terminology and Symbols in Colloid and Surface Chemistry' on page 596 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac197231040577)
